title: EastEnders spoilers: Ben reveals a shocking secret tonight
text:
Ben Mitchell (Max Bowden) has kept quite a few secrets in his time in EastEnders, but tonight he’s going to be sharing a rather big one with Sharon Mitchell (Letitia Dean), who’s found herself embroiled in a bitter rivalry with Mel Owen (Tamzin Outhwaite) as of late.

Sharon returned from her trip to Portugal during last night’s episode having acquired the villa that Mel desperately craved. As a result, she hoped that her problems would finally be at an end — but Mel had other ideas in mind. Having offered Ruby (Louisa Lytton) first refusal to buy the club, Mel planned on taking another thing that Sharon holds dear.

When Sharon got wind of the offer to Ruby, she was fuming, but Mel reminded her of what’s at stake. As a result, the Mitchell matriarch backed down, realising that Mel’s manipulation isn’t going to end any time soon.

Tonight, Mel continues to discuss the club with Ruby, and — later — Ruby decides to meet with Sharon to discuss the sale. However, Sharon disputes the amount that Ruby has offered, and the pair end up exchanging some words as a result.

Later, Sharon discusses the sale of the club with Ben — who’s inquisitive about why she’s selling in the first place — and she reveals that Mel’s the one responsible for her sudden decision.

As a result, Ben shares a secret with Sharon — and it’s one that could change everything.

Has Sharon finally got the leverage that she needs?

EastEnders continues Thursday 31stOctober at 7:30pm on BBC One.
